title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the view maximized state is not maintained. The views that were previously maximized are restored to their default size and position.
EB: The software should remember the maximized state of views when switching perspectives. When a perspective is switched, the views that were maximized should remain maximized.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the software and maximize a view. 2. Switch to a different perspective. 3. Note that the previously maximized view is no longer maximized and has returned to its default size and position.
